verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> came to me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> for Zion <S%H6726><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, and I was jealous <S%H7065><s%> for her with great <S%H1419><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; I am returned <S%H7725><s%> unto Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and will live <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>; and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; There shall yet old men <S%H2205><s%> and old women <S%H2205><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> in the streets <S%H7339><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> with his staff <S%H4938><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> for very <S%H7230><s%> age <S%H3117><s%>.
And the streets <S%H7339><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of boys <S%H3206><s%> and girls <S%H3207><s%> playing <S%H7832><s%> in the streets there <S%H7339><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; If it be marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%>, should it also be marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in my eyes <S%H5869><s%>? says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Behold <S%H3467><s%>, I will save my people <S%H5971><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, and from the west <S%H3996><s%> country <S%H776><s%>;

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> them <S%H7931><s%>, and they shall live in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and they shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be their God <S%H430><s%>, in truth <S%H571><s%> and in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Let your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%>, you that hear <S%H8085><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, which were in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> was laid <S%H3245><s%>, that the temple <S%H1964><s%> might be built <S%H1129><s%>.

For before <S%H6440><s%> these days <S%H3117><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> no hire <S%H7939><s%> for man <S%H120><s%>, nor any hire <S%H7939><s%> for animal <S%H929><s%>; neither was there any peace <S%H7965><s%> to him that went out <S%H3318><s%> or came in <S%H935><s%> because of the affliction <S%H6862><s%>: for I set <S%H7971><s%> all men <S%H120><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.
But now I will not be unto the residue <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> as in the former <S%H7223><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

For the seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be prosperous <S%H7965><s%>; the vine <S%H1612><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> her fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and the ground <S%H776><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> their dew <S%H2919><s%>; and I will cause the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> to possess all these things <S%H5157><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7045><s%>, that as you were a curse among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; so will I save <S%H3467><s%> you <S%H1293><s%>, and you shall be a blessing: fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H3027><s%>, but let your hands be strong <S%H2388><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; As I thought <S%H2161><s%> to punish <S%H7489><s%> you <S%H1><s%>, when your fathers provoked me to wrath <S%H7107><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and I repented not <S%H5162><s%>:

So again <S%H7725><s%> have I thought <S%H2161><s%> in these days <S%H3117><s%> to do well <S%H3190><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: fear not <S%H3372><s%>.

These are the things <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do <S%H6213><s%>; Speak <S%H1696><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; execute <S%H8199><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> in your gates <S%H8179><s%>:

And let none <S%H376><s%> of you imagine <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in your hearts <S%H3824><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; and love <S%H157><s%> no false <S%H8267><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%>: for all these are things that I hate <S%H8130><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; The fast <S%H6685><s%> of the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month <S%H6685><s%>, and the fast of the fifth <S%H2549><s%>, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%>, and the fast <S%H6685><s%> of the tenth <S%H6224><s%>, shall be to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness <S%H8057><s%>, and cheerful <S%H2896><s%> feasts <S%H4150><s%>; therefore love <S%H157><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; It shall yet come to pass <S%H935><s%>, that there shall come people <S%H5971><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> city shall go <S%H1980><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> speedily <S%H1980><s%> to pray <S%H2470><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and to seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: I will go also <S%H3212><s%>.

Yes <S%H7227><s%>, many people <S%H5971><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and to pray <S%H2470><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; In those days <S%H3117><s%> it shall come to pass <S%H6235><s%>, that ten men <S%H582><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> out of all languages <S%H3956><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, even shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> of the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of him that is a Jew <S%H376><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We will go <S%H3212><s%> with you <S%H8085><s%>: for we have heard that God is with you <S%H430><s%>.
